short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Access your team's shared knowledge from anywhere in Chrome.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Slab is the leading knowledge base and wiki to easily create, organize, and discover knowledge across the entire company, from non-technical to tech-savvy.

With Slab for Chrome, you can quickly list all your recent or favorite posts, search for any available to your team, and view their entire content â€” all from a convenient, minimal sidebar so you don't have to leave the page your are on.
